title: Energy Explosion Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! 

This package contains 10 Energy Explosion sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/qRLwJqHXnW0


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Energy 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Energy 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Energy 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Energy 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Energy 05_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Energy 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Energy 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Energy 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Energy 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Energy 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1152


Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances: 10

Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
